title: Diving fundamentals
creator_credit: Norman L. Sper and New Official Films
brief_description: Opens with a brief history of the sport of diving followed by a demonstration and explanation of the fundamental techniques of diving including the correct way of take-off and lift, entry into the water, proper arm action and body positioning. Commentary by Ken Carpenter. Instruction by Fred Cady.
